altername_name: No-appointment Gals Olympos: Apo Nashi Gals Olympos
name: No-Appointment Gals Olympos Syokaiban
overview: The player controls a god that is chosen by the Olympus gods to battle the guardian summoner, to do that the player can summon gals, high school student that are transformed into female warriors that can fight the guardian warriors using different battle cards. No-appointment Gals is basically a battle card game. It's a little more complicated than just selecting cards mind you but that's the main point to the game, the player doesn't control the character in the battles, but he select what the character will do depending of the card that he chooses.
